body.p: Presets are stored configurations for a module's parameters. Some modules already have internal pre-defined presets but you can also define your own. Both internal and user-defined presets are displayed by clicking the icon with the currently activated preset shown in bold text.
The preset system also supports automatic preset selection based on image data such as focal length, ISO, camera model and other fields.
As a convenience, a preset can be applied to a new module instance by pressing the middle-click.
